text: The men's 100 metre freestyle competition of the swimming event at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 7 June at the OCBC Aquatic Centre in Kallang, Singapore. ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing Asian and Games records were as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- |Asian record | |47.70 |Incheon, South Korea |25 September 2014 |- |Games record | |49.99 |Naypyidaw, Myanmar |13 December 2013 |} The following records were established during the competition: {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !! Record |- | 7 June || Final ||align=left|Joseph Isaac Schooling ||align=left| || 48.58 ||align=center| GR |} ==Schedule== All times are Singapore Standard Time (UTC+08:00) {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time !
